mainText:
May he rest in peace! And thanks for everything he gave us during his life! For
me he was a hero! he was a  person with a good imagination and perfectionism! I never get to know him I know that i will never forget him! Without him many
things would not be as they are today. he open doors to a new whole new
word! I just hope that the other workers at Apple keep them open!
author: Jeansel
